name: FastPNG
description: Mod that speeds up loading times slightly

low-memory-mode.name: Low Memory Mode
low-memory-mode.description: Makes certain parts of the asset converter use much less memory, at the cost of being slower

cache-as-raw.name: Cache Raw Images
cache-as-raw.description: Caches images as uncompressed data instead of PNG. Might be faster on systems with a slower CPU and a fast drive
